pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimating Controlled Direct Effects for Explaining Causal Findings // A set of functions to estimate the controlled direct effect of treatment fixing a potential mediator to a specific value. Implements the sequential g-estimation estimator described in Vansteelandt (2009) doi:10.1097/EDE.0b013e3181b6f4c9 and Acharya, Blackwell, and Sen (2016) doi:10.1017/S0003055416000216.
